statements: SELECT * FROM movies LIMIT 5;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year = 2021;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title FROM movies ORDER BY movie_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY release_year;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year >= 2000 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_title LIKE 'The%' ORDER BY movie_title;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2015 AND rating < 8.0 ORDER BY release_year DESC, rating ASC;
SELECT movie_title, release_year, rating FROM movies ORDER BY rating DESC, release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT title, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM movies GROUP BY title;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, rating FROM movies WHERE id = 10;
SELECT title, rating, COUNT(rating) AS total_ratings FROM movies GROUP BY rating HAVING total_ratings > 5 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;
SELECT m.title, r.user_id, r.rating FROM movies m INNER JOIN ratings r ON m.id = r.movie_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY m.title ASC, r.rating DESC;
SELECT m.title, r.rating, COUNT(r.id) AS total_ratings FROM movies m LEFT JOIN ratings r ON m.id = r.movie_id GROUP BY m.title, r.rating HAVING total_ratings > 3 ORDER BY m.title ASC;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title, release_year, rating FROM movies WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE rating >= 8.0 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT movie_title, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM movies GROUP BY movie_title HAVING AVG(rating) > 7.0;
SELECT movie_id, movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE movie_title LIKE '%love%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000 ORDER BY movie_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating >= 8.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT movie_title, release_year FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies WHERE rating < 5.0 ORDER BY movie_title DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT movie_name, release_year, rating FROM movies;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT movie_name, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT movie_name, release_year, genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genre ON movies.movie_id = movie_genre.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genre.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT movie_name, release_year FROM movies WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT movie_name, release_year, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT m.movie_name, g.genre_name FROM movies m JOIN movie_genre mg ON m.movie_id = mg.movie_id JOIN genres g ON mg.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE m.movie_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM movies;
SELECT movie_name, release_year, rating FROM movies WHERE release_year < 1990 ORDER BY release_year DESC, rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM Movies;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies WHERE rating > 8.0;
SELECT director_name, birth_date FROM Directors WHERE birth_date < '1980-01-01';
SELECT actor_name FROM Actors WHERE actor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT title, release_date, rating FROM Movies;
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE birth_date >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM Directors JOIN Movies ON Directors.director_id = Movies.movie_id GROUP BY director_name;
SELECT title, genre_name FROM Movies JOIN MovieGenres ON Movies.movie_id = MovieGenres.movie_id JOIN Genres ON MovieGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT director_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Directors JOIN Movies ON Directors.director_id = Movies.movie_id GROUP BY director_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 8.0;
